item.title: Davidude36's Iron dropper
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

i really think your should use that crosshair, because without it people have to guess exactly where to put the client, remember it changes if someone has a different screen resolution.

also you’ve made a mistake with the random, you wrote something like…

clickmouse(654(random(5)),232(random(5));

this is wrong, you have to add the + signs, so scar knows to plus, its not a big thing, i just noticed it as i was reading, heres a corrected version

clickmouse(654+random(5),232+random(5));

also, please use the ‘code’ button, it makes it much easier to read scripting on the forums, its around the smilys toolbar, it looks like a hash (#)

Read full topic

heres a tip to make it less detectable, use includes.
[/quote]
Includes on your first script? Lame.
My first few scripts didn’t use includes, and at the time were undetectable, but that was ages ago.[/quote]
My first real script used includes, and it still works for an hour+ at a time, completely undetectable (maybe not completely.)

@briatwork wrote:

Kyle, that’s just not helpful. This section is for first time scripters, people need to learn the basics before moving on to understand more complicated scripting.

David, scar has a built in auto run button feature. Go to tools option, then redefine hotkeys.

item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

thanks, im still gonna keep it fast, but now i know how to put random timings in, do you know how to do that to mouse click, i.e. something like clickmouse(123+random(2),456(random(4),true) ?? thanks

and while im on it how would i go about making the script run when i press a button, i.e. pressing f1 would start the script? thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Davidude36's Iron dropper
item.dc:creator: @briatwork briatwork
item.description:
@briatwork wrote:

Firstly I’d slow it down; using a wait time of 50 is just not human like at all, 500 would be closer to the mark. To add in a bit of random time do this:

wait(500+random(200))

Read full topic

item.title: Davidude36's Iron dropper
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Ok, so i remade this, my old one was called dave’s dropper, but it seemed to only work with iron, which is what i was using it to drop, this makes iron mining alot faster :D, i got to lvl 79 mining using this script before i was banned -_-, i think its pretty detectible but if you want it you take it, dont blame me for getting banned.
all feedback apreciated!!! thanks

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// // Davidude36's iron dropper v1.0 // // now even less detectable!! // // drag the crosshair onto the rs screen // // and make sure silent mouse is off then click ctrl+alt+R to // // begin, make sure you only have iron in your inventory, or it // // will be dropped. // // if you wish to use a different button then ctrl+alt+R then // // go to tools - redefine hotkeys (Then change to what button you want // // all feedback greatly apreciated - dave.rocks@hotmail.com // // or leave feedback on // // http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,4322.msg43269.html#msg43269 // //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// program davesirondropper; Begin //Backpack Click// Movemousesmooth(648,189) Wait(50+Random(50)) clickmouse(648+Random(10),189+random(10),true) wait(50+random(50)) //First Ore// //I am choosing to leave this out because i have a rune pic axe in first inventory slot //if you wish to have the script drop it then add in "Movemousesmooth(578,228); //wait(50+random(50)); //clickmouse(578+random(1),228+random(1),false); //wait(50+Random(50)); //Movemousesmooth(571,269); //wait(50+random(50)); //clickmouse(571+random(1),269+random(1),true); //wait(50+Random(50)); " without the quote marks, and take away the "//"'s //Second Ore// Movemousesmooth(585,265); wait(50+random(50)); Clickmouse(585+Random(1),265+random(1),false); wait(50+Random(50)); Movemousesmooth(572,306); wait(50+random(50)); Clickmouse(572+Random(1),306+random(1),true); wait(50+random(50)); //Third Ore// Movemousesmooth(585,300); wait(50+random(50)); Clickmouse(585+Random(1),300+random(1),false); wait(50+random(50)); Movemousesmooth(575,339); wait(50+Random(50)); Clickmouse(575+Random(1),339+Random(1),true); wait(50+random(50)); //Forth Ore// Movemousesmooth(583,338); wait(50+random(50)); Clickmouse(583+Random(1),338+random(1),false); wait(50+Random(50)); Movemousesmooth(570,379); wait(50+random(50)); clickmouse(570+Random(1),379+random(1),true); wait(50+random(50)); //Fifth Ore// Movemousesmooth(588,373); wait(50+Random(50)) Clickmouse(588+random(1),373+random(1),false); wait(50+random(50)); Movemousesmooth(571,414); wait(50+random(50)); Clickmouse(571+Random(1),414+random(1),true); wait(50+random(50)) //Sixth Ore// Movemousesmooth(584,409); wait(50+random(50)); Clickmouse(584+Random(1),409+Random(1),false); wait(50+random(50)); movemousesmooth(573,427); wait(50+Random(50)); Clickmouse(573+Random(1),427+random(1),true); wait(50+random(50)); //Seventh Ore// Movemousesmooth(585,444); wait(50+random(50)); clickmouse(585+random(1),444+random(1),false); wait(50+RAndom(50)); movemousesmooth(572,426); wait(50+random(50)); clickmouse(572+Random(1),426+random(1),true); wait(50+random(50)); //Eighth Ore// movemousesmooth(628,230); wait(50+random(50)); clickmouse(628+Random(1),230+random(1),false); wait(50+Random(50)); movemousesmooth(587,271); wait(50+Random(50)); clickmouse(587+Random(1),271+Random(1),true); wait(50+Random(50)); //Ninth Ore// movemousesmooth(626,265); wait(50+Random(50)); clickmouse(626+Random(1),265+random(1),false); wait(50+random(50)); movemousesmooth(586,307); wait(50+Random(50)); clickmouse(586+RAndom(1),307+random(1),true); wait(50+random(50)); //Tenth Ore// movemousesmooth(628,301); wait(50+random(50)); clickmouse(628+random(1),301+Random(1),false); wait(50+random(50)); movemousesmooth(587,342); wait(50+Random(50)); clickmouse(587+Random(1),342+Random(1),true); wait(50+Random(50)); //Eleventh Ore// movemousesmooth(626,339); wait(50+Random(50)); clickmouse(626+Random(1),339+random(1),false); wait(50+Random(50)); movemousesmooth(586,380); wait(50+Random(50)); clickmouse(586+Random(1),380+random(1),true); wait(50+Random(50)); //Twelvthe Ore// Movemousesmooth(627,371); wait(50+Random(50)); clickmouse(627+Random(1),371+Random(1),false); wait(50+Random(50)); movemousesmooth(588,413) wait(50+Random(50)); clickmouse(588+RAndom(1),413+Random(1),true); wait(50+Random(50)); //Thirteenth Ore// movemousesmooth(627,410); wait(50+Random(50)); clickmouse(627+random(1),410+Random(1),false); wait(50+Random(50)); movemousesmooth(587,428); wait(50+Random(50)); clickmouse(587+Random(1),428+random(1),true); wait(50+Random(50)); //Forteenth Ore// movemousesmooth(627,446); wait(50+Random(50)); clickmouse(627+Random(1),446+Random(1),false); wait(50+Random(50)); movemousesmooth(590,428); wait(50+Random(50)); clickmouse(590+random(1),428+Random(1),true); wait(50+Random(50)); wait(50+random(50)); movemousesmooth(629,377); wait(50+Random(50)); clickmouse(629+random(1),377+Random(1),true); wait(50+random(50)); //Nineteenth Ore// movemousesmooth(669,372); wait(50+Random(50)); clickmouse(669+Random(1),372+Random(1),false); wait(50+Random(50)); movemousesmooth(629,414); wait(50+Random(50)); clickmouse(629+random(1),414+Random(1),true); wait(50+Random(50)); //Twentieth Ore// movemousesmooth(669,408); wait(50+Random(50)); clickmouse(669+random(1),408+Random(1),false); wait(50+Random(50)); movemousesmooth(628,426); wait(50+Random(50)); clickmouse(628+Random(1),426+random(1),true); wait(50+Random(50)); //Twentyfirst Ore// movemousesmooth(669,444) wait(50+Random(50)); clickmouse(669+random(1),444+Random(1),false); wait(50+Random(50)); movemousesmooth(629,428); wait(50+Random(50)); clickmouse(629+Random(1),428+random(1),true); wait(50+Random(50)); //Twentysecond Ore// movemousesmooth(711,229); wait(50+Random(50)); clickmouse(711+random(1),229+Random(1),false); wait(50+Random(50)); movemousesmooth(645,271); wait(50+Random(50)); clickmouse(645+random(1),271+random(1),true); wait(50+Random(50)); //Twentythird Ore// movemousesmooth(712,266); wait(50+Random(50)); clickmouse(712+Random(1),266+random(1),false); wait(50+Random(50)); wait(50+Random(50)); movemousesmooth(647,343); wait(50+Random(50)); clickmouse(647+random(1),343+Random(1),true); wait(50+random(50)); //TwentyFifth Ore// movemousesmooth(713,337) wait(50+Random(50)); wait(50+Random(50)); clickmouse(708+random(1),374+Random(1),false); wait(50+Random(50)); movemousesmooth(645,416); wait(50+Random(50)); clickmouse(645+Random(1),426+Random(1),true); wait(50+Random(50));
